Title: Adrian Pimento
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Luke Del Tredici, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: The precinct gains a new detective who has just completed a 12-year undercover job with the mob, Charles' latest mess prompts the janitors to refuse to clean the precinct, and Gina directs a video for Holt.
